title: Mindscribe AI
description: Developed Mindscribe, An AI-powered journaling tool for personal development, integrating prompt engineering using Langchain.

title: Ticket Management AWS App
description: Built a serverless AWS React app for event organization and ticket sales using Lambda, DynamoDB, API Gateway, CloudFront, and Cognito.

title: Moodify: React & Spotify API Mood Analyzer
